div.p: Implications for Northern Annular Mode: ( a, b) represent the covariance of the wintertime 250 hPa westerly wind with the wintertime 250 hPa NAMI for ( a) BCF-experiment and ( b) NF-experiment. ( c, d) are the same as ( a, b) but for the covariance of 50 hPa westerly wind with the 250 hPa NAMI. Only significant differences at 95%-level according to a covariance test are shaded.
